sn22.130:4.2: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘knowledge’.
sn22.130:4.4: And how is an knowledgeable person defined?”
sn22.130:5.1: “Reverend, an educated noble disciple truly understands the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form,
sn22.130:5.7: And this is how an knowledgeable person is defined.”
